import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{toast}from'react-toastify';import useProfileStore from'../store/profileStore';import nsfService from'../services/nsfService';const useGenerateProposals=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const{teams,setIsGeneratingProposals,setTeamsWithProposals}=useProfileStore();const generateProposals=async()=>{if(teams.length===0)return;setIsGeneratingProposals(true);try{const data=await nsfService.generateProposals(teams);setTeamsWithProposals(data);// Store the teams with proposals in Zustand
navigate('/teamswithproposal');}catch(error){console.error(error);toast.error('Error generating proposals. Please try again later.');}finally{setIsGeneratingProposals(false);}};return{generateProposals};};export default useGenerateProposals;
